StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSixWeekShipViewGridRegularMaleStat]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ScheduleDate date.me, @OrgID int AS
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM CONTRACT C WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA N ON (C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, @ScheduleDate, C.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 42 AND C.DISCHARGE_CODE IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SHIPPER S WHERE S.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID)) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RSS ON (N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS') INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON C.COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON (P.PERSON_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE = dbo.GetMaxASVABDate(CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID)) WHERE CC.COMPONENT_CODE = 'K5' AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M'
